column4: HI i've to listen this radio http://www.elleradio.it/ascolta.php?op=wmp but i cant see the streaming player.. why?
well with the op=wmp - i would guess the site is targeting windows media player
yes but my friend can listen it with ubuntu
he must have some extra plugins enabled on his system
he uses ubuntu, I'm using lubuntu
shouldent matter. you just need to install the proper codec pack/browser plugin that hes using
tell me, can you see the player?
what was the url again?
http://www.elleradio.it/ascolta.php?op=wmp
it works here
wich player?
its playing in the default totem player
can I install it?
its in the package manager.. so .. YES you Could install totem.. and  all sorts of other stuff.
vlc mmsh://65.19.129.26/nuovaspazioradio?MSWMExt=.asf
also works here
nice, thanks.
i told it 'copy' the url in the browser/icon/player had a menu item.
thats.. an err.. annoying radio station. :) of course i cant understand what they are saying.
is italian :D
and its LOUD talking italian :)
check out the 'adobe air' appication called 'antenna' if you like radio :)
http://bcdef.org/antenna/
so far every player ive tried.. has worked with that url. from teh command line.. mplayer, vlc, totem -->   mplayer  mplayer  mmsh://65.19.129.26/nuovaspazioradio?MSWMExt=.asf
